# 0.9.2

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_helm",
    integrity = "sha256-mq4xm1zefQrDTI58WYMImEVbAK/2LhMOuwuSvc7CwFY=",
    urls = ["https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/releases/download/0.9.2/rules_helm-v0.9.2.tar.gz"],
)
```

Additional documentation can be found at: https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm

* Release 0.9.2 by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/116


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/compare/0.9.1...0.9.2

# 0.9.0


Additional documentation can be found at: https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm


## What's Changed
* Updated rules_go and various pins by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/112
* Add support for OCI registries to `helm_push` by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/113
* Added support for helm plugins by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/111
* Release 0.9.0 by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/114


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/compare/0.8.0...0.9.0

# 0.7.0

```python

```

Additional documentation can be found at: https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm


## What's Changed
* Separate out test dependencies from the core bzlmod extensions by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/105
* remote_tag can be used as image ref by @dormidon in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/103
* Mark test dependencies as dev dependencies by @mering in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/107
* Release 0.7.0 by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/108

## New Contributors
* @dormidon made their first contribution in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/103
* @mering made their first contribution in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/107

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/compare/0.6.0...0.7.0

# 0.6.0

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_helm",
    integrity = "sha256-easVF1EdnzWNj0sqE7TgqwCfvq3BEfA/poKPAfLA4Kw=",
    urls = ["https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/releases/download/0.6.0/rules_helm-v0.6.0.tar.gz"],
)
```

Additional documentation can be found at: https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm


## What's Changed
* Update outdated MacOS CI runner by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/92
* Reduce reliance on leaked transitive dependency by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/93
* Bump MacOS Github runner version by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/94
* Switch release notes from `sha256` to `integrity` by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/95
* Improved test for helm chart deps by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/97
* Update rules_oci to 2.0.0 by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/98
* Updated default Helm version to 3.16.1 by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/99
* Release 0.6.0 by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/100


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/compare/0.5.1...0.6.0

# 0.4.0

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_helm",
    sha256 = "df2be832065a08b8a27aabb5f6d8781a25c2db476ed93f6591d2945edc381a23",
    urls = ["https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/releases/download/0.4.0/rules_helm-v0.4.0.tar.gz"],
)
```

Additional documentation can be found at: https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm


## What's Changed
* Add support for templates folder when packaging helm (#69) by @iDiogenes in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/70
* Reference resolved helm toolchain for the host by @kormide in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/75
* fix: incorrect host alias symlink on some platforms by @kormide in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/80
* Allow helm to be used in a genrule by @kormide in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/79
* Update helm artifacts to use `integrity` by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/81
* Add support for `+` in package versions by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/82
* Release 0.4.0 by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/83

## New Contributors
* @iDiogenes made their first contribution in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/70
* @kormide made their first contribution in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/75

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/compare/0.3.2...0.4.0

* Release 0.3.0 by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/63

## What's Changed
* Updated default Helm version to 3.13.0 by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/18
* Update gofmt check to actually error by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/19
* Support rules_oci + bzlmod by @opicaud in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/17
* Applied buildifier fixes by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/20
* Setup CI for bzlmod by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/21
* Renamed `oci_image` attributes to `image` by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/22
* Added a test rule to help ensure images are correctly resolved in packages by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/23
* Fixed image stamping with bzlmod by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/25
* Release `v0.0.5` by @abrisco in https://github.com/abrisco/rules_helm/pull/24
